summary: MY 2008 TOYOTA CAMRY THAT I PRUCHES FOUR MONTHS AGO WITH ONLY 31000 MILES, THE DRIVER SIDE SUN VISOR FLIPPES DOWN WHILE DRIVING BLOCKING MY VIEW. SO I TOOK MY CAR BACK TO THE DEALER WHERE AT FIRST THEY DIDNT WANT TO FIX THE PROBLEM, SAYING IT WASNT COVER UNDER MY WARRENTY,  BUT WITH SOME  HELP FROM ONE OF THE MANGER CALLING THE WARRENTY COMPANY THEY WANT AHEAD AND REPLACE BOTH DRIVER AND PASSENGER. *TT
